description: The slow cooker does all the hard work to make this pear and almond cake perfectly every time.
name: Slow Cooker Pear & Almond Cake Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 large pears, peeled, cored and halved lengthways

recipeInstructions.text: Grease the slow cooker basin with a little butter, add a layer of foil and grease it. Dot the foil with 50g of butter and scatter with light brown sugar. Arrange the pears cut side down on the foil.
Beat the rest of the butter and caster sugar until pale and fluffy in a stand mixer. Add the eggs one at a time, beating after each addition, add almond extract and beat to combine.
Gently mix in the flour, baking powder, cinnamon and ground almonds, then fold in the milk. Smooth the mix over the pears with a spatula.

Add a piece of parchment paper to the slow cooker (without touching the batter) and place the lid on to secure. Cook on low for 3 hours. Turn off the heat and leave to sit for 30 minutes before turning out on to a serving plate.
